name: Lazarus' Blood Lust
description:
What a Wonderful Night for a Curse!

The Blood Moon has summoned Lazarus and there is a lot of work that must be done. There are curses to be set and there is flesh to be eaten and there's not much time. Navigate your way through the Halls of Calamity and find the Orb of Sorrow to start your reign of terror!

Controls

Lazarus

  • Direction -- arrows / D-pad
  • Crouch -- down arrow / down on D-pad
  • Jump -- space / Gamepad A button
  • Fire -- F/ Gamepad X button
  • Transform -- down key held and Jump button once fully crouched

Bat

  • Direction -- arrows / D-pad
  • Jump -- space / Gamepad A button
  • Transform -- Fire button once fully at rest

Possessed Soul

  • Direction -- arrows / D-pad
  • Jump -- space / A button
  • Suicide -- Fire button

Firing a wave of psychic energy will affect  foes differently depending on their spirit. Some with a strong will may not be affected -- others may kill themselves.
